title: Integrated Digital Competency Enhancement Training Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency (e.g., smartphone app utilization)
context.additional_context: A non-degree program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to acquire digital teaching competencies linked to social studies. Providing mobile-optimized content considering environments without PCs

learning_goals: Learners acquire the ability to design three or more educational scenarios using subject-specific digital tools (e.g., quiz platforms, collaboration tools).
Learners improve technology acceptance (Technology Acceptance Model) by over 20% when designing digital-subject integrated lessons based on the TPACK framework.
Learners complete two or more peer feedback projects using smartphone-based digital assessment tools (e.g., surveys, portfolios).

resources: Free Educational App Package for Smartphones
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
